categories: Category:Star Wars Droids: Season of Revolt

nodes.text: Star Wars Droids: Season of Revolt (TPB)

Star Wars Droids: Season of Revolt is a Trade Paperback collecting the 4 issues from the Season of Revolt story-arc from the Star Wars: Droids series. The Paperback was only released in the UK, with Boxtree Ltd co-publishing it with Dark Horse Comics.
